title: Tradelous Backend
extendedDescription: Backend service for the Tradelous Desktop and Tradelous Mobile applications, providing comprehensive API endpoints and data management for users, companies, products, and sales. Built as a robust foundation to support the frontend applications.

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Authentication system with JWT tokens and role-based access control.

features.name: Business Management
features.description: Company administration with employee management and operational controls.

features.name: Sales & Analytics
features.description: Transaction recording with multiple payment methods and reporting system.
